citation: Proclamation under the Building and Construction Industry Training Fund Amendment Act 2004 (Tas)
text:
Proclamation under the Building and Construction Industry Training Fund Amendment Act 2004

I, the Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council, by this my proclamation made under section 2 of the Building and Construction Industry Training Fund Amendment Act 2004 fix 1 March 2005 as the day on which that Act commences.

7 February 2005

W. J. E. COX

Governor

By His Excellency's Command,

PAULA WRIEDT

Minister for Education

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 16 February 2005

This proclamation is administered in the Department of Education.
